title: Complementary and Supplementary Angles
description: An interactive MicroSim demonstrating complementary angles (sum to 90°) and supplementary angles (sum to 180°) with visual arcs and real-time calculations.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Mathematics
Geometry
Angles
learningObjectives: Understand the mathematical concept of complementary and supplementary angles
Apply complementary and supplementary angles to solve problems
Visualize and interpret complementary and supplementary angles relationships
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on complementary and supplementary angles
